attributes.action: AFTER the resignation of Lizz Truss, the people want a GENERAL ELECTION NOW!!
attributes.additional_details:
Because the people of Great Britain have spoken.

We do not trust the Conservative party to lead.
attributes.background:
Incompetence, back room deals and shady political tactics that many MP's ARE truly ashamed of, it's time to call a spade a spade and eject these Political squatters out of Whitehall.

Enough is enough.

General Election NOW!

rejection.details: You may wish to sign this petition which calls for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/619781
